fields.name: Communication
fields.description: Ability and willingness to Communicate effectively

fields.name: Collaboration and Teamwork
fields.description: Ability and desire to help others and to identify areas where collaboration is needed

fields.name: Problems Solving and Decision Making
fields.description: Ability to identify problems and to collect information to make informed decisions and to overcome difficulties

fields.name: Execution
fields.description: Ability to complete assigned work within the expected time. Ability to look for better ways to do things

fields.name: Motivation and Initiative
fields.description: Ability and willingness to contribute more and in different ways

fields.name: Leadership
fields.description: Ability to exhibit leadership qualities in the roles he / she plays
